title: There are only 12 binaries in Talos Linux - Sidero Labs
author: Justin Garrison
description: Talos is a single purpose Linux distribution for Kubernetes. We only include binaries you need. Here's a list of all the binaries and what they do.
cntitle: Talos Linux 中只有 12 个二进制文件 - Sidero Labs
cndescription: Talos 是一个专用于 Kubernetes 的 Linux 发行版。我们只包含您需要的二进制文件。以下是所有二进制文件及其作用的列表。
